</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Let '''x''' be a number, then '''exp (x)''' is equal to '''e to the power of x''' (or e^x) </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''exp''' x </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  x: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_result = [[exp]] 1</code>

returns 2.7182 </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Math Commands]] [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E_(mathematical_constant) E (mathematical constant)]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
